plot: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab

Something crawls out from an underground lab in the quiet town of Hawkins and kidnaps a local child. The whole town and the child's friends embark in an adventure searching for him. A girl pursued by some shady agents will cross paths with the local kids.—kanedasajfar

It's 1983 in a small town in Indiana. After playing late with his friends, Will Byers heads home in the dark on his bike. He is confronted by a mysterious figure on the road in the woods near his home. The next morning when she realizes he's missing, his mother, Joyce and older brother, Jonathan alert the local police chief who at first thinks he's either been abducted by his father or has just run away. A few strange discoveries change his mind and a full scale search begins. In the meantime, nearby, a young girl who barely speak, emerges from the woods and is found by a restaurant owner who tries to help her, but there is more going on than there first seems to be with the disappearance of one child and the appearance of the other.

A dungeons and dragons boy named Will Byers mysteriously vanishes after seeing something terrifying in the woods; His brother and mom are in contact with the police and are taken in for questioning; His friends embark on a journey to go into the woods to find Will and take him home; A young with the name "Eleven" is taken in for questioning by the cook, Benny Hammond.
